entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SPMI with `JitNoInline=1` asserts in instrumentation code #74718
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Get period from PeriodicTimer #74716
  • [API Proposal]: Add DateTime support overload for ToDateTime in PersianCalendar #74713
  • [NativeAOT] Revisit process/thread termination scenario #74711
    Future
  • System.Net.Security.Tests crash on NativeAOT arm64 #74710
  • System.Net.Security.Tests.NegotiateAuthenticationKerberosTest asserts on Android #74708
  • standard2.0 Type.IsAssignableFrom not work #74700
  • Helix test results are not getting uploaded for a lot of jobs #74699
  • Complete warnings for AOT unsafe interop #74697
    8.0.0
  • MarshalUsing does not work with generics #74694
  • incorrect computation of build parallelism #74691

Closed

  • Consider adding more tests for the Equals instance method for the various vector types #68710
    Future
  • a field evaluates to null but passes a null check! #74706
  • Don't native build for the app cause missing meta exception #74503
    Future
  • Default implementation of an interface to satisfy another interface it inherits from is malfunctioning #74703
  • SqliteException: SQLite Error 1: 'no such table: Movie' #74659
  • Tests being used at runtime are only correct for the first build #2879
    Future
  • ASP.NET location not found in ubuntu 22.04 when running dotnet watch #74688
  • .NET 6 vs .NET 7 reflection performance regression #74550
    7.0.0
  • Crossgen2 crashes on linux-x64 #70543
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fold field offsets into array addresses #74719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ARM64] - JitDisasm - Make zero values and commas consistent #74717
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disallow `ASG(..., IND<struct>)` before morph #74715
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [NativeAOT] do not do shutdown for the main thread on Windows #74712
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable KerberosExecutor on LinuxBionic, it doesn't have GSSAPI libraries #74709
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Delete `lvPromotedStruct` #74702
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Vector documentation #74701
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Move `src/tests/BuildWasmApps/*` to `src/mono/wasm` #74698
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use nproc without --all on Linux #74696
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • improve hanling of TLS certificates on Linux #74695
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • [release/7.0] For perf, remove Invoker pattern for fields #74693
    area-System.Reflection
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74692
  • [release/7.0] Fix stack unwinding for NativeAOT on Unix #74690
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [LoongArch64] supporting `src/tests/run.sh` on LA64. #74470
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Non-canonical NaN tests for Vector Equals method (Issue #68710) #74517
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] do not do shutdown for the main thread on Windows #74679
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add `[NotNullIfNotNull]` to conversions from `string` to `JsonNode`. #74643
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Don't crash on recursive native layout #74630
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix stack unwinding for NativeAOT on Unix #74673
    os-linux, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Pass over interop tests with NativeAOT #74627
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Pass /NOEXP /NOIMPLIB options to the linker when publishing native AOT .exes #74641
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some erros when testing GCstress4. #74469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • For perf, remove Invoker pattern for fields #74614
    area-System.Reflection
  • Revert "[MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component (#71203)" #74674
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Revert "[MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component (#71203)" #74675
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #72725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Only widen short local stores #74685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't crash compilation on invalid UnmanagedCallersOnly #74546
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve morphing of bit comparisons to constant 0/1 #73120
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Swallow ObjectDisposedException when aborting QuicStream from CancellationAction #74634
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Discourage using explicit package references to ILCompiler to publish #74591
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing reducing CI load #74601
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Retry logic for distributed transactions test #74648
    area-System.Transactions
  • Adapt System.CommandLine (v2) in more places #72082
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add custom comparer to use incremental generator caching for LoggerMessageGenerator and JsonSourceGenerator #74558
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix chinese character in project name #74516
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • JIT: extend copy prop to local fields #74384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Mark certain compiler-created locals as aliased #74665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android][libs] Introduce GetLocalUtcOffset temporary fast result #74459
    area-System.Runtime, os-android

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Handling of recursive native layout #163

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Optimisation on compiling problem #1859

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Allow inlining to handle SPK_ByValue for TARGET_WASM #1969

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: do not mark the shadow stack as a local on the llvm stack if not referenced #1968
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Allow `RyuJitCompilation` to turn off tail calls #1966

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Could not copy the file deps.json because it was not found. Microsoft.Common.CurrentVersion.targets 4919 #17645
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • apicompat: sort suppressions #27500
    Area-ApiCompat

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Weird pattern matching behavior #63560

Updated

  • Expose "IsGeneratedCode" on analysis contexts #7578
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense not suggesting namespaces after `using` for top-level statements #58470
    17.3
  • "Change signature" drops namespace qualifier for alias-qualified names #63628
    Backlog
  • Function pointers shouldn't trigger IDE1005 (Delegate invocation can be simplified) #50976
    Backlog
  • Type test for ref struct is incorrect #63085
    17.4
  • Introduce IParameterSymbol.AssociatedSymbol to allow one to relate a primary constructor parameter to it's associated prop #54286
  • Allow user to restrict scope of namespace rename changes #39426
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not suggest 'nullable' keyword in pragma directive #63633
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #63632
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63631
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add a try/catch to help us track down a crash #63621
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix casing in VB file #63630
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add stages to the Roslyn CI #63607
    Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #63496
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63638
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/ConvertToRecord #63637
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #63636
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #63635
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Do not show "Convert to raw string" refactoring for C# version lower than 11 #63593
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Do not return awaited void task in "Introduce local" refactoring #63385
    Area-IDE, Community
  • No IDE0060 for unused parameter in partial method implementation #63530
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Record added node output states as new #61575
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Delete Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.Desktop #63624
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Use 'checked' names for synthesized vb intrinsic operators #63604
    Area-Compilers
  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers
  • Convert workspaces and new document formatting integration tests to new framework #63610
    Area-IDE
  • Inheritance of base positional records #63525
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM - TypeError: Window.fetch: HEAD or GET Request cannot have a body. #43602
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_actix, fortunes_dapper #43601
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #43600
  • Tag helpers break dotnet watch hot reload #43593
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext_nodejs #43592
  • Remove temporary workaround to not use msbuild server #43581

Closed

  • Authorize attribute with AllowAnonymous attribute always anonymous. #43550
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, mvc #43361
  • Perf improvement: json_actix #43438
  • Perf improvement: https, json_actix #43574
  • Blazor: get currently focused element #43541
  • using the blazorwebview control to load a local and external plugin of blazor webassembly program in the Maui blazor program does not work #43565

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1971992 #43599
    area-infrastructure
  • Move to newer xUnit packages #43598
  • Use normal `$(_BuildArgs)` in internal jobs w/ binlogs #43597
    area-infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43596
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #43595
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `257f68f` to `1edf19d` #43589
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `9044834` to `1edf19d` #43591
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `c0e032e` to `afd902e` #43588
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `7274ec1` to `afd902e` #43586
    area-infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43584
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Cover release/7.0 in our pipelines #43483
    area-infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43578
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution

Updated

  • fix #43523 Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding conflicts #43558
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • docs: Remove syntax error in xml docs for `AuthenticationBuilder` #43575
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Add and use RDF.InferMetadata and update new PopulateMetadata API #43543
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc2
  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BaseSize on .svg files is not supported #9716
  • Button visual state doesn't reset to "Normal" after "Pressed" on Windows (similar to #5824) #9715
  • Running app crashes immediately #9714
  • Grid contained in a StackLayout doesn't render an image in the first column if it is set to GridLength.Auto #9713
  • CollectionView throws Recycled-Exception while loading Images with Web-URL #9712
  • Can't deploy my application #9711
  • Weird bugs concerning static resources and value converters #9709
  • Android and iOS do not report Window.Frame values #9708
  • Tizen does not report Window.Frame values #9707
  • Consuming Component that uses Nuget package in Razor class Library #9706

Closed

  • Performance issue in LayoutExtensions.ShouldArrangeLeftToRight #8175
    .NET 7
  • CSS hot reload fails in .NET MAUI Blazor app after 2nd edit #9197
    7.0-rc2
  • BlazorWebView on Windows Forms locks CSS files while the app is running #7479
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Unable to debug native Android libraries #9555

PullRequests

Created

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9705
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Remove GetEffectiveFlowDirection and defer flow direction handling to platforms #9558
  • Obsolete OpenGLView #9660
  • Blazor Hybrid CSS Hot Reload Fixes #9645
    area/blazor 🕸️

Updated

  • Enable Window Sizing #4942
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0-rc1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • TimeFromParts not working #27853
    7.0.0-rc2

Updated

  • [Question] How to build table metadata at runtime via migration API and generate DDL. #28864
  • Datatable Load seems to take far too long to execute. #28879
  • Support sproc input/output parameters on non-concurrency-token properties #28704
    7.0.0
  • Incorrect simple join table determination in reverse engineering leads to incorrect code generation #28905

PullRequests

Created

  • Support sproc input/output parameters on non-concurrency-token properties #28908

Merged

  • SqlServer Query: Use correct return type for DATE/TIMEFROMPARTS functions #28904

Updated

  • Update BenchmarkDotNet version #28901
  • Translate non-aggregate string.Join to CONCAT_WS on SQL Server #28900
